content: in the next 19 sts 28 half_double_crochet total round 14 work half_double_crochet decrease half_double_crochet in next 5 sts half_double_crochet decrease half_double_crochet in ea st around 26 half_double_crochet total rnds 15 18 work half_double_crochet in ea st around cuff in green row 1 leaving a long tail to attach cuff to mitten chain 8 row 2 chain 1 working in back loops only single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in ea chain across 7 single_crochet total row 3-24 repeat row 2 25 row total fasten_off with longer tail sew cuff to bottom of mitten weave in ends make a 2nd mitten using opposite colors green for color b red for color a
